entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
